SELECT cmn.community_id, cmn.community_name, cmn.community_description, `user`.user_name, cg.category_name, cmn.created_time, cmn.updated_time FROM community AS cmn INNER JOIN category AS cg ON cmn.category_id = cg.category_id INNER JOIN user_info AS `user` ON cmn.created_by = `user`.user_id
AND cg.category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{categoryName}, '%')
AND cmn.community_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{communityName}, '%')
AND `user`.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND cmn.community_description LIKE CONCAT( '%', '#{communityDescription}', '%' )
AND cmn.community_underview = 1
ORDER BY cmn.created_time DESC
